st:Description.name: SmartLoading
st:Description.st:detailedRole: These settings handles the configuration parameters for the CGR selective loading framework

st:attribute.Name: SelectiveLoading
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables selective loading on CGR files
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: This setting activates/deactivates the selective loading capability of CGR files when working in visualization mode

st:attribute.Name: Unload
st:attribute.st:role: Enables/disables unloading mechanism on CGR files
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: This setting allows for automatic unloading of visualization data when memory reaches a certain value

st:attribute.Name: UnloadMB
st:attribute.st:role: Size in MB that triggers the unload of visualization data
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the visualization memory consumption in MB that triggers the unload mechanism
